query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS messageHistory (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  customerId INT NOT NULL,
  customerName VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  customerPhone VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  message TEXT NOT NULL,
  status ENUM('pending', 'sent', 'failed') DEFAULT 'pending' NOT NULL,
  errorMessage TEXT,
  sentAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2CUNeJnYnTRxHkL.275a04e24557 --database RJnuvqs68igmigugNEp5S4 --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS messageHistory (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  customerId INT NOT NULL,
  customerName VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  customerPhone VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  message TEXT NOT NULL,
  status ENUM('pending', 'sent', 'failed') DEFAULT 'pending' NOT NULL,
  errorMessage TEXT,
  sentAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)
